Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - Tory Burch - Dubai Mall

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of Store “Tory Burch Boutique at Dubai Mall” the opening date is on Saturday 02nd Nov 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - Tory Burch - Dubai Mall

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of Store “Tory Burch Boutique at Dubai Mall” the opening date is on Saturday 02nd Nov 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - Tory Burch - Dubai Mall

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of Store “Tory Burch Boutique at Dubai Mall” the opening date is on Saturday 02nd Nov 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that we have an updated date for the Re-Opening of Store “Tory Burch Boutique at Dubai Mall” Handover date on 5th Nov the re-opening date is on Friday 8th Nov 2024.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth opening and arranging the needs as per the assigned individual tasks within the given time frame,
